analysis.description:
Reentrancy in RenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#416-460):
	External calls:
	- forwardFunds(weiAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#435)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds(weiAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#435)
	- msg.sender.transfer(weiToReturn) (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#439-440)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contribution (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#452-453)
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#448-450)

Reentrancy in RenCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#494-511):
	External calls:
	- vault.close() (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#499-500)
	- token.unpause() (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#501)
	- token.transferOwnership(owner) (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#504)
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#505-506)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#507)

RenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x5a779aaeb53d2cba1755442c38dd6721c0cb31d0.sol#416-460) does not use the value returned by external calls:
